original: bcad gtubs kyang de la de 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: bcad gtubs kyang de la de 'di snyam ste /
translated: even if they are cut and split, they think,

original: kye ma chos rnams @130a *//
analyzed: kye ma chos rnams @130a *//
translated: “Oh!🔽

original: kyi chos nyid 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste /
analyzed: kyi chos nyid 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste /
translated: The intrinsic nature of phenomena is truly amazing,

original: 'di la chos gang la'ang spyo ba'am /🔽kyal ba'am / bcad pa'am /
analyzed: 'di la chos gang la'ang spyo ba'am / kyal ba'am / bcad pa'am /
translated: for in this there is no one who is reviled,🔽no one who reviles,🔽no one who cuts,🔽no one who splits,

original: gtubs pa'am / brdeg pa'am /
analyzed: gtubs pa'am / brdeg pa'am /
translated: no one who beats,

original: bcings pa med do //
analyzed: bcings pa med do //
translated: and no one who is bound.’

original: snyam ste / rab 'byor /🔽de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: snyam ste / rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom incorporate the perfection of patience.

original: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom incorporate the perfection of perseverance?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom incorporate the perfection of perseverance.

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, standing in the perfection of wisdom,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te /
translated: standing in the four supports for miraculous abilities,

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas lus dang sems kyi brtson pa bskyed de /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas lus dang sems kyi brtson pa bskyed de /
translated: with skillful means, generate physical and mental exertion.

original: de 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam /
analyzed: de 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam /
translated: They go to one world system,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'am /🔽'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'am / 'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam /
translated: or a hundred world systems,🔽or a thousand world systems,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag tu song ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag tu song ste /
translated: or up to a hundred thousand one hundred million billion world systems,

original: sems can rnams la chos ston cing /
analyzed: sems can rnams la chos ston cing /
translated: and teach the Dharma to sentient beings.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi @130b pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi @130b pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do //
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in the applications of mindfulness,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la rab tu 'god do //
translated: up to the noble eightfold path.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do //
translated: in the result of once-returner, in the result of non-returner, in the state of a worthy one, and in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de'ang ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de'ang ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: And they do so in such a way that they do not establish them in the compounded element,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar rab tu 'god de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar rab tu 'god de /
translated: and he does not establish them in the unconditioned element.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti, in that way the bodhisattva great being standing in the perfection of wisdom

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: takes hold of the perfection of perseverance.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Lord, how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: take hold of the perfection of concentration?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par /
translated: except for the tathāgata’s concentration,

original: nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam /
translated: the śrāvaka concentration,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tam /
translated: the pratyekabuddha concentration,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin kyang rung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin kyang rung ste /
translated: or the bodhisattva meditative absorption,

original: ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed @131a *//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed @131a *//
translated: whatever meditative absorptions there are,

original: pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: he becomes absorbed in all of them.

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas shing /
translated: Dwelling in those meditative absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //
translated: he becomes absorbed in and rises from the eight deliverances in forward and reverse order.

original: brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
translated: Subhūti, here the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, while having form, sees forms. This is the first deliverance.

original: nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas /
analyzed: nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas /
translated: Endowed with the perception of the internal formlessness,

original: phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: he sees external forms. This is the second deliverance.

original: bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
translated: He becomes absorbed in the beautiful. This is the third deliverance.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: He completely transcends all perceptions of form,

original: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
analyzed: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
translated: The notion of obstruction disappears, and since one does not attend to the notion of variety, one thinks, “Space is infinite.”

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o //🔽de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o // de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Thus, having completely transcended the sphere of infinite space, one thinks, “Consciousness is infinite.”

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te /🔽rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o //🔽de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o // de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Thus, having completely transcended the sphere of infinite consciousness, one thinks, “There is nothing whatsoever.”🔽Thus, having completely transcended the sphere of nothingness, one enters and remains in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.🔽This is the seventh liberation.

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i @131b skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i @131b skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o //
translated: Thus, having completely transcended the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, one enters and remains in the cessation of perception and feeling.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Having completely transcended the sphere of nothing-at-all,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o //
translated: he abides in the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception. This is the seventh liberation.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Having completely transcended the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception,

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste /
translated: he abides in the cessation of perception and feeling. This is the eighth liberation.

original: de ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //
translated: Thus, he enters and emerges from these eight liberations in forward and reverse order.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ste /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ste /
translated: He enters and emerges from the nine serial absorptions in forward and reverse order.

original: dgu gang zhe na /
analyzed: dgu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the nine?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di 'dod pas dben /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, separated from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: separated from evil and unwholesome dharmas,

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with thought and investigation,🔽with the joy and pleasure born of separation,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
translated: establish and maintain the first concentration.🔽When their thoughts and investigations are stilled,

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa /
translated: their inner being becomes lucid and their minds become one-pointed, without thought and investigation,

original: dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan @132a *//
analyzed: dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan @132a *//
translated: with the joy and pleasure born of samādhi,

original: gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: they establish and maintain the second concentration.

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te; bde ba lus kyis myang la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa /🔽btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te; bde ba lus kyis myang la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa / btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: The noble ones describe them as abiding in equanimity with mindfulness, experiencing pleasure with the body.

original: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: They have attained the third meditative concentration, which is free from joy.

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
translated: They have given up pleasure and given up pain,

original: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /🔽bde ba'ang med /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas / bde ba'ang med /
translated: and with the earlier disappearance of mental pleasure and displeasure,🔽they abide in equanimity and mindfulness.

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They have attained the fourth meditative concentration, which is free from both pleasure and pain.🔽They have transcended all perceptions of form

original: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: and have not given rise to any other perceptions.

original: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas /🔽nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
analyzed: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas / nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
translated: The perception of obstruction disappears, and one does not pay attention to the perception of variety.🔽“Infinite space”

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: is the sphere of infinite space.🔽“Infinite consciousness”

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: is the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad @132b med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad @132b med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: “Nothing whatsoever”

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: is the sphere of nothing whatsoever.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: “Neither perception nor non-perception”🔽is the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: They transcend the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, and

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: they rest in the cessation of perception and feeling.

original: de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //
translated: In this way, they enter into and arise from the nine successive stages of meditative absorption, both in forward and reverse order.

original: de rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag rnam par phye zhing /
analyzed: de rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag rnam par phye zhing /
translated: Having distinguished the eight aspects of liberation and the nine successive stages of meditative absorption,

original: sengge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: sengge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: they enter into the meditative absorption known as the majestic lion.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin sengge rnam par bsgyings pa de gang zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin sengge rnam par bsgyings pa de gang zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ meditative absorption known as the majestic lion?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings are free from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: It is free from negative and non-virtuous factors.

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: It is accompanied by thought and investigation.
